game.name: Maple Salmon: Sara’s Cooking Class
game.description:
Welcome to the cooking class of the world popular chef – Sara, who is always ready to share some exciting and interesting cooking recipes with people of all ages. This time she is going to teach you how to prepare an extremely delicious and nutritious treat for your family and friends. One of the best free online game for girls, Maple Salmon: Sara Cooking Class is designed to help girls how to cook Maple Salmon within the quickest time and through easiest ways. All you need to follow Sara easy instructions to complete the task shortly. 

Hey friends! Chef Sara is happy to introduce you a completely new and scrumptious recipe known as Maple Salmon. A dish which is full of lean meat from salmon and sweetness from maple will surprise your friends and ensures you to have the best taste you have even taken. The character "Sara" in itself a big game for all online game lovers and brings out a challenging yet interesting game for kids this time. Do your best cooking skills to earn the maximum possible score and complete the task in the shortest possible time.

This cool flash game features dynamic graphics, easy control and amazing gameplay. So, what are you waiting for? Is this not the perfect time to learn the latest kind of dish – a fish dish with salmon? Roll up your sleeves, come and join the highly talented girl Sara cooking class to make a difference tomorrow in this fun cooking game for kids.
